channel.title: Question about signatures
channel.description:
Okay so somebody had messaged me saying that their signature was removed due to it advertising their programming services and suggested i did the same. I then passed the information on to somebody else.
I am curious now, what exactly are we allowed to put in our signatures? Are we allowed to put forums, advertising paid services, what?

item.title: Question about signatures
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I think we can post anything really, but no porn along with the obvious no-no’s, no selling stuff, as it’s a rule on these forums. Can’t break a rule in your signature…

Read full topic
